dog.how are you: I'm wagging my tail, thanks for asking!
dog.tell a me joke: Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts!
dog.favorite toy: My favorite toy is a squeaky ball. It's so much fun!
dog.favorite treat: I can't resist a tasty, meaty treat!
dog.dream: In my dreams, I'm chasing squirrels in a never-ending park!

cat.tell a me joke: Why did the cat sit on the computer? To keep an eye on the mouse!
cat.favorite toy: I adore playing with a dangling feather toy. It's so much fun to pounce!
cat.favorite treat: I'm quite fond of fish-flavored treats. They're simply irresistible!
cat.dream: In my dreams, I'm lounging in a sunbeam, ruling over my kingdom.

bird.how are you: I'm chirping happily, thanks for asking!
bird.tell a me joke: Why did the bird join a band? Because it had perfect pitch!
bird.favorite toy: I love swinging on a colorful perch and pecking at shiny bells!
bird.favorite treat: I go nuts for sunflower seeds. They're my absolute favorite!
bird.dream: In my dreams, I'm soaring high in the sky, exploring new horizons.
